para0.title: Introduction.
para0.para: This section describes the scope, purpose, and content arrangement of this chapter.

subpara1.title: Scope.
subpara1.para: This chapter provides Test Program Instructions (TPIs) for each of the Units Under Test (UUT) using the AN/PSM-130 TPS on the Test Station. In addition to the UUTs, the self-test for both IDs are discussed. The chapter is divided into 12 sections. Section I contains general introduction information. Sections II through XI each contain information on a single UUT. Section XII contains information on the AN/PSM-130 TPH self-test.

subpara1.title: Purpose.
subpara1.para: The purpose of this chapter is to provide the maintenance technician with the information necessary to execute performance and diagnostic tests on the UUTs and Test Program Hardware (TPH) in the field.

subpara1.title: Content Arrangement.
subpara1.para:
This chapter is divided into sections for each LRU and ID tested with the AN/PSM-130 TPS. Each individual section contains set-up instructions and lists the necessary equipment to run the LRU test programs or ID Self-Test. Within each section, a button bar provides links to additional information (when available) the user may need during testing. The buttons are as follows:
TOO – UUT Theory of Operation
Comp Lay – UUT Component Layout
UUT Sch – UUT Schematic
ID Sch – ID Schematic
UUT ELTD – UUT English Language Test Description (ELTD)
ID ELTD – ID English Language Test Description (ELTD)
TPS – (launches Test Program Software)
